node.detail_zh: 患者過往健康良好，無外遊記錄，為第 #1569 宗個案患者的家人，與第 #1619 及 #1620 宗個案患者屬同一家庭群組。7 月 10 日開始發燒及咳嗽。
node.detail_en: The patient has good past health and no travel history, is a family member of patient #1569, and is in the same family cluster including patients #1619 and #1620. She developed fever and coughs on July 10.
node.classification_zh: 本地個案的密切接觸者

groups.name_en:
Tsz Wan Shan Shopping
Centre Windsor (restaurant)
groups.description_zh: 慈雲山中心 5 樓的蕰莎餐廳有員工及食客確診。
groups.description_en: The cluster involves staff members and customers of the Windsor, 5/F Tsz Wan Shan Shopping Centre.
